xmlText.p: First Period_1, Florida, Matheson 9 (McGinn, McCann), 1:25. 2, Buffalo, Reinhart 15 (O'Reilly, Antipin), 5:34. 3, Florida, Ekblad 13 (Dadonov, Yandle), 16:41. Penalties_Nolan, BUF, Major (fighting), 16:37; Haley, FLA, Major (fighting), 16:37.

Third Period_None.
